thread.title: Mary Lynn
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Mary Lynn

author: Mary Lynn
title: Mary Lynn
text: I can't imagine dealing with an agent who was more knowledgeable, professional or as prompt to respond to my concerns as Steven Cotten has been. This has been the case with all the agents I've dealt with at SelectQuote: , whether it was life insurance, home or auto. But Steven has been especially helpful.
